page.title: 02 CUSTOMS
page.content: GOREBRIDGE GALA DAY EACH JUNE THE ANNUAL CHILDREN'S GALA DAY IS HELD IN THE VILLAGE.THIS IS THE CULMINATION OF A WEEK OF FESTIVITIES, WHEN THE KING AND QUEEN ARE CROWNED AND A PROGRAMME OF EVENTS ARE STAGED ON THE GALA FIELD.THE COURT,WHICH CON- SISTS OF THE KING AND QUEEN,CHIEF MAID HERALD,MAIDS OF HONOUR,FLOWER GIRLS YEOMEN,SCEPTRE,CROWN,TRAIN & STANDARD BEARERS AND PAGES,IS SELECTED FROM PUPILS IN PRIMARY 4 & 7 IN THE LOCAL SCHOOLS.DURING GALA WEEK EVENTS ARE ORGANISED TO HELP RETAIN A GOOD COMMUNITY SPIRIT.FLAGS AND BUNTING ARE HUNG IN THE STREETS AND COURT MEMBERS DECORATE THEIR OWN DOORWAY.THE WHOLE COURT PROCESSES ROUND THE VILLAGE TO THE GALA FIELD WHERE THE CROWNING TAKES PLACE.DURING THE AFTERNOON THERE ARE COMPETITIONS AND SHOWS.BAGS OF SWEETS ARE DISTRIBUTED TO ALL CHILDREN
